title: Bronze 3 Pro smurf looking for 1 night stand with 1 or 2 lucky summoners ;)

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
First, yes I'm a smurf - and no my main is not diamond.

I am good enough to get the scores linked in the description. I'm looking for 1 or 2 people to duo with. My perfect duo partner has a high Kda on recent games but loses their games cos of bad teammates - duo with me, get that win. Enjoy the freelo. They also add me before 5:30 PM and are able to play from about 5:30 onwards late into the night, tonight. They don't skype. I'm happy to use any other voice comms, just not skype.

I'll see who adds me when I finish work and log on. I'll also recheck this thread throughout the day.

As this acc is only bronze I can only duo with bronze or silver. i'll be winning many games tonight. Will you?

Cheers,
The Teemonator

replies.body: Please add me. I dont mind boarding in the choo choo freelo train

> [{quoted}](name=RonyStark,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=upJrRdIB,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-05-13T03:38:32.964+0000)
>
> Please add me. I dont mind boarding in the choo choo freelo train

Choo choo baby. The train leaves at 5.15pm get your tickets boyz. 

I will even post an 'after' board thread with results just for lols.
i am bronze 2 planning on climbing to gold with other high elos, i average about 26 lp a game u in?
Lol this guy isnt a smurf, look at his match history he sucks balls deep haha

Hey man,

Just wondering if there's another train coming tonight as I'd be more then happy to board it :)
About myself, I'm currently Bronze 1 looking to push into Silver. I don't play as often as I used to because of school, but this weekend I'm free and would love to play some games with you.

-Fennix :)
Hey man, I'm buried in bronze and I find the climb is savage in having to enter the yolo solo queue. Would really appreciate some help. 👍🏻
No one likes smurfs like that, its fucking cancer so unfair for those bronze people

> [{quoted}](name=Vanilla Bread,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=upJrRdIB,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-13T02:40:36.169+0000)
>
> No one likes smurfs like that, its fucking cancer so unfair for those bronze people

Ahhh a smurf hater I see, well then. How do you explain the Gold elo Vanilla Toast! haha. Obviously that's your smurf. Busted mate ! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
yea im totally smurfing dude! its not like lolking shows that i peaked plat last season

Hey aren't you the guy that posted this

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/yX0TRO3E-im-a-high-elo-player-who-is-drunk-and-smurfing-on-a-bronze-account-looking-for-a-duo-to-carry

You're a fucking riot man. I hope the keyword "riot" makes them look at you. Pretty sure smurfing is against the ToS and you shouldn't be advertising it on forums.

If smurfing was against the ToS, a lot of pros would be in a tricky situation having lots of smurfs. However if you are not the original creator of an account Riot support has no responsibility to help you as you would have broken the ToS.

> [{quoted}](name=dhOnta,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=upJrRdIB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-13T01:34:19.470+0000)
>
> Hey aren't you the guy that posted this
> 
> http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/yX0TRO3E-im-a-high-elo-player-who-is-drunk-and-smurfing-on-a-bronze-account-looking-for-a-duo-to-carry
> 
> You're a fucking riot man. I hope the keyword "riot" makes them look at you. Pretty sure smurfing is against the ToS and you shouldn't be advertising it on forums.

Back then I also had the belief that smurfing is reportable.
But after inquiring here and there in the forum, I find out that smurfing is not against the ToS, but it is simply being frowned upon.

Unless the ToS have changed, smurf is not against the ToS.
Yes that's me. its against ToS to account share. This is my account. ;) thanks for your concern.

I'm not sure why you'd advertise your 100% win rate champions like that, can be misleading.
But yes, you can check my recent match statistics, I have 4.33 KDA last 20 matches and am almost out of Bronze.

I probably won't be available tonight until  8pm, but you seem like a determined person, so I'll add you.

> [{quoted}](name=Jonius7,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=upJrRdIB,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-13T02:51:09.028+0000)
>
> I'm not sure why you'd advertise your 100% win rate champions like that, can be misleading.
> But yes, you can check my recent match statistics, I have 4.33 KDA last 20 matches and am almost out of Bronze.
> 
> I probably won't be available tonight until  8pm, but you seem like a determined person, so I'll add you.

I like your attitude and your correct use of punctuation. I'll be looking forward to playing with you after 8pm. ;)

Also with teh 100% win rate, half of them I only played once, its a smurf account with not many ranked games played so naturally there will be high win %'s on my preferred champs. It was more a way of letting the smarter forum goers know that I'm an ADC/Mid/Jungle main and I'm not talking smack about winning a lot ;)
